short_summary: Cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for Crown-owned portfolio.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Responsive Maintenance Services

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title**: W3702-24-BN01 Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Borden
* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4233789870-Doc4233823905
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4233789870
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-19T14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31
* **UNSPSC Codes**: *30161700, 72102902, 72102903, 72151301, 72152300, 72152601, 76101600, 76110000, 76121900, 81141800

## Scope of Work

The Department of National Defence (DND) through the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) invites bidders to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for their Crown-owned portfolio. The services include:

* Flooring
* Landscaping services
* Snow removal services
* Residential painting service
* Carpentry services
* Roofing service
* Hazardous material decontamination
* Cleaning and janitorial services
* Hazardous waste disposal
* Facilities management

## Tendering Requirements

* Bidders must submit their bid and all required supporting documentation by 2023-12-19T14:00:00 EST.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
* There is an optional teleconference associated with this requirement. Bidders must confirm their attendance by 2023-11-08T14:00:00 EST.

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Martin Gauthier
* Contact Email: martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note:
The rewritten text is concise, clear and free of unnecessary information. The text only includes the most relevant information to the tender announcement. It is well-formatted and easy to read, making it more accessible to bidders.  The professional tone is maintained and is suitable for a formal government tender announcement.   No franc
